title: The Invisible boy
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aging

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social isolation
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
description: Charlie visits his unconventional mountain-dwelling aunt and can't wait to get home. To keep him with her the aunt tells Charlie she can make him invisible and by pretending not to see him, her spell has seemingly worked. However when Charlie still wants to go home, the aunt creates another kind of invisible boy. Based on the short story by Ray Bradbury. Starring Christian Slater and Kate Reid. Suitable for upper primary and lower and middle secondary levels.
